attributes.action: Ask the Queen to award a posthumous knighthood to Ronnie Barker
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The man is an absolute legend and deserves this more than any other alive or deceased comedian. Sir David Jason said of Ronnie: "I attribute most of what I've done and achieved to Ronnie Barker. I always called him the guvnor which he was for me'. 
If Sir David Jason was knighted and his mentor was 'The Guvnor', surely this makes sense...

rejection.details: Sorry but we no longer deal with posthumous award requests.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
